title: Find the Missing Letters
content:
e the third option, and if pass the DC 15 Deception Check, the cat will believe you and allow you to loot the Bundle of Letters nestled within its nest.

Return to Danzo at the Sword Coast Couriers and to hand the letters over. He'll reward you with 320 Gold.
